ValidationRule.description: when users select the Hold Out checkbox they must supply an expiration date or perm hold out reason
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator")), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"NSS")), Hold_Out__c = true, ISNULL( Hold_Out_Expiration__c ), ISPICKVAL( Permanent_Hold_Out_Description__c ,"" ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: **** You are required to set the Hold out Expiration date when checking the Hold out checkbox or put in a Permanent Hold Out Description****
